title: Requirement Analysis
description: The goal of requirement analysis is to test the Next.js project idea.

title: UI/UX design
description: The goal of a discovery stage is to test and develop the project idea.

title: Development and testing
description: Through continuous testing, we make sure the code we develop is clean, effective, and free of bugs.

title: Maintenance
description: Software grows outdated, technical errors occur, and the project idea undergoes changes.
